channel.title: Devolution 7 - Premium member
channel.description:
Heya guys,
I'm gonna sound like a total neek saying this, but here goes. YB TEH WYA EM SI A NEKE!!!!!!
Lol, so I'm using devolution 7 as a base, but i need to know how to make people premium members. Not "Go into there file" and i also don't mean auto on login, because of course i know that :)
I am putting it in a void, and to save you some time i've already tried the following: [code] premium = true; [/code]
That isn't working, and i have also added: [code] savegame(true); [/code] after it, to save the game just to be sure.
So does anybody know how to solve this? [b]Thank You.[/b]

item.title: Devolution 7 - Premium member
item.dc:creator: @Zelda_Knight Zelda Knight
item.description:
@Zelda_Knight wrote:

Good Guess
And no i don’t think it is playerismember because in client.java it uses (premium), and for the case of making mods and admins auto premium, it uses:

premium = true;

Although, putting that in a void is not working.

Any help?

Read full topic

item.title: Devolution 7 - Premium member
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

lol actually i was wondering that… my guess is it means Nerd+geek combined?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

what is a neek?

Read full topic

item.title: Devolution 7 - Premium member
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

Open Player.JAVA
hit CTRL+F and search for:

playerIsMember =

change the 0 to a 1. save and compile

Read full topic
